author: Alejandro Avila
comment: somebody forgot a space between the web address and a null

author: Nicolas gosse
comment: App is just the mobile website. Sometimes paying online via the app can be a true hassle as it crash/bug/ask to open in another app, just redirect to the website or if you're lucky works as intended.

author: Dag Wieers
comment: The app does not remember Paypal credentials (pizza.be app does it correctly). It always refers to Domino's Pizza Antwerpen Kiel. Very confusing when my address is in Gent.
title: Could be better

author: al0a
comment: Does what it has to. One minor: on crazy Tuesday and Saturday the coupon code is not automatically filled in, and you need to search online to find the code.
title: Good app.

author: Godspraise Itotoh
comment: too good too easy .... im buying too much pizza now 😆
title: brilliant

comment: Type street & post code, get right streetname in another postcode halfway across the country, just like the site, broken
title: Wrong address
